name: Simple Coin Flip
description:
This might take a few seconds to load, as there  is a bug in the engines web export.

Known bug: Game sizing issue. This is when the game is zoomed way to far in. Will try to fix as soon as possible. However this doesnt happen for everyone. Depends on screen size.

This is just a very simple one button "game".

It's a coin flipper where the coin can be happy or sad. See which side you will get by pressing "Enter" on your keyboard.

This was a fun little project i made in a couple of hours for fun while taking a small break from bigger projects. Hope it will help in some sense with a dispute you might have had or decide a decision that you wanted to make, like buying a new pencil or something.

Again this was a fun small thing, hope you enjoy.
